tests.title: all records ingested
tests.query: select ivoid from rr.resource

tests.title: simple resource fields I
tests.query: SELECT ivoid, res_type, created, res_title, updated, reference_url, source_format, source_value, res_version, waveband from rr.resource where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/gums/q/pub'

tests.title: simple resource fields II
tests.query: select res_type, short_name, rights from rr.resource where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/siap/xmm-om'
expected: This must only contain the first rights content

tests.title: region of regard is a float
tests.query: select ivoid, round(region_of_regard*25000, 4) from rr.resource where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/siap/xmm-om'

tests.title: type prefixes normalized
tests.query: select res_type from rr.resource where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/siap/xmm-om'

tests.title: non-ascii in merged authors
tests.query: select creator_seq from rr.resource where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/gums/q/pub'

tests.title: resource.res_type
tests.query: select distinct res_type from rr.resource

tests.title: creator_seq case preserved
tests.query: select creator_seq from rr.resource where creator_seq like '%Hanisch%'
expected: Roy Williams; Robert Hanisch; Alex Szalay; Raymond Plante

tests.title: compound content level works I
tests.query: select ivoid from rr.resource where 1=ivo_hashlist_has(content_level, 'elementary education')

tests.title: compound content level works II
tests.query: select count(*) from rr.resource where 1=ivo_hashlist_has(content_level, 'research')

tests.title: ivo_hashlist_has isn't just a fake
tests.query: select ivoid from rr.resource where 1=ivo_hashlist_has(content_level, 'education')

tests.title: waveband is hashlisted and lowercased
tests.query: select ivoid from rr.resource where 1=ivo_hashlist_has(waveband, 'optical') and 1=ivo_hashlist_has(waveband, 'infrared')

tests.title: content_type is hashlisted and lowercased
tests.query: select ivoid from rr.resource where 1=ivo_hashlist_has(content_type, 'organisation') and 1=ivo_hashlist_has(content_type, 'archive') and 1=ivo_hashlist_has(content_type, 'library')

tests.title: ivo_hasword is case-insensitive
tests.query: select ivoid from rr.resource where 1=ivo_hasword(res_description, 'supercosmos')

tests.title: ivo_string_agg works
tests.query: select ivoid, ivo_string_agg('item', '/glue/') from rr.resource natural join rr.res_subject where ivoid like '%ap%' group by ivoid

tests.title: no deleted records
tests.query: select count(*) from rr.resource where ivoid='ivo://x-unregistred-test/TNG-OIG-SIAP'

tests.title: no contact from deleted record
tests.query: select count(*) from rr.res_role where email='invalid@oats.inaf.it'

tests.title: empty string mapped to NULL
tests.query: select name from rr.table_column where unit is NULL and ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/gums/q/pub'

tests.title: searches by non-ASCII character work
tests.query: select ivoid, base_role from rr.res_role where role_name='C. Reylé'

tests.title: various roles
tests.query: select base_role, role_name from rr.res_role where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/siap/xmm-om'

tests.title: res_role address, email, telephone
tests.query: select street_address, email, telephone from rr.res_role where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/arihip/q/cone' and base_role='contact'

tests.title: res_role logo
tests.query: select logo from rr.res_role where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/6df-ssap' and logo is not null

tests.title: role ivoid present and normalized
tests.query: select distinct role_ivoid from rr.res_role where role_name='The GAVO DC team' and base_role='publisher' and role_ivoid is not null

tests.title: multiple subjects
tests.query: select res_subject from rr.res_subject where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/keckobs'

tests.title: no case normalization
tests.query: select res_subject from rr.res_subject where 1=ivo_nocasematch(res_subject, '%satellite%')

tests.title: capability standard fields
tests.query: select cap_type, standard_id from rr.capability where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/6df-ssap' and cap_description is null

tests.title: capability types properly translated
tests.query: select distinct cap_type from rr.capability where cap_type is not null

tests.title: capability description imported
tests.query: select standard_id from rr.capability where cap_description='Knock here'

tests.title: schema case rules
tests.query: select schema_name, schema_utype, schema_title from rr.res_schema where 1=ivo_hasword(schema_description, '2mass plus ppmx')

tests.title: multiple schemata present
tests.query: select count(*) from rr.res_schema where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/__system__/tap/run'

tests.title: table basic columns
tests.query: select ivoid, table_name, table_title, table_type, table_utype from rr.res_table where 1=ivo_hasword(table_description, 'positions proper motions photometry')

tests.title: references to schema
tests.query: select schema_name from rr.res_table natural join rr.res_schema where table_name in ('gums.quasars', 'ppmxl.data')

tests.title: res_table multiple entity
tests.query: select table_name from rr.res_table where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/__system__/tap/run'

tests.title: table_column basic columns I
tests.query: select name, ucd, std, datatype, type_system from rr.table_column where 1=ivo_hasword(column_description, 'number star hipparcos esa')

tests.title: table_column basic columns II
tests.query: select name, unit, datatype, flag from rr.table_column where 1=ivo_hasword(column_description, 'Right Ascension single-star')

tests.title: flag hashlisted, unit not normalized
tests.query: select name, unit from rr.table_column where 1=ivo_hashlist_has(flag, 'indexed') and 1=ivo_hashlist_has(flag, 'nullable')

tests.title: references to table
tests.query: select schema_name, table_name, name from rr.res_schema natural join rr.res_table natural join rr.table_column where ucd like 'test.%'

tests.title: interface basic fields
tests.query: select ivoid, intf_type, intf_role, query_type, result_type, url_use, std_version, authenticated_only from rr.interface where access_url='http://dc.zah.uni-heidelberg.de/arihip/q/cone/scs.xml?'

tests.title: references to capability
tests.query: select standard_id from rr.interface natural join rr.capability where std_version='1.0'

tests.title: another reference to capability
tests.query: select standard_id from rr.interface natural join rr.capability where access_url like '%RegistryQueryv1_0'

tests.title: authenticated_only set from securityMethod
tests.query: select ivoid, intf_type, authenticated_only from rr.interface where authenticated_only!=0

tests.title: intf_param basic fields
tests.query: select name, ucd, unit, utype, std, datatype, param_use from rr.intf_param where 1=ivo_hasword(param_description, 'Right Ascension ICRS decimal')

tests.title: intf_param references to interface
tests.query: select name, access_url, standard_id from rr.intf_param natural join rr.capability natural join rr.interface where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/siap/xmm-om'

tests.title: relationship basic fields
tests.query: select ivoid, relationship_type, related_id from rr.relationship where 1=ivo_nocasematch(related_name, '%lensed quasars')

tests.title: relationship denormalized
tests.query: select count(*) from rr.relationship where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/__system__/tap/run' and relationship_type='isservicefor'

tests.title: join through relationship
tests.query: select access_url, standard_id from (rr.capability natural join rr.interface as a) join (rr.relationship as b natural join rr.resource) on (a.ivoid=b.related_id) where 1=ivo_hasword(res_title, 'test observatory')

tests.title: capability validation
tests.query: select validated_by, val_level, standard_id from rr.validation natural join rr.capability where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/siap/xmm-om'

tests.title: resource validation
tests.query: select validated_by, val_level from rr.validation where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/siap/xmm-om' and cap_index is NULL

tests.title: res_date basics
tests.query: select date_value, value_role from rr.res_date where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/gums/q/pub'

tests.title: cone search details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value from rr.res_detail natural join rr.capability where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/arihip/q/cone' and cap_type='cs:conesearch'

tests.title: ssap details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value from rr.res_detail natural join rr.capability where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/6df-ssap' and cap_type='ssap:simplespectralaccess'

tests.title: data collection details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value from rr.res_detail where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/gums/q/pub' and cap_index is null

tests.title: tap details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value from rr.res_detail natural join rr.capability where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/__system__/tap/run' and cap_type='tr:tableaccess'

tests.title: instrument details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value from rr.res_detail where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/keckobs' and cap_index is null

tests.title: siap details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value from rr.res_detail natural join rr.capability where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/siap/xmm-om' and cap_type='sia:simpleimageaccess' and detail_value!=''

tests.title: image service details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value from rr.res_detail where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/siap/xmm-om' and cap_index is null and not detail_xpath like '/rights%'

tests.title: org record details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value from rr.res_detail where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test' and cap_index is null

tests.title: registry service details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value from rr.res_detail where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/registry' and cap_index is null

tests.title: registry capability details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value, cap_type from rr.res_detail natural join rr.capability where ivoid='ivo://x-invalid-test/registry'

tests.title: standard record details
tests.query: select detail_xpath, detail_value from rr.res_detail where ivoid='ivo://ivoa.net/std/conesearch' and cap_index is null

tests.title: Rights, RightsURI end up in rr.resource
tests.query: select rights_uri, rights from rr.resource where source_value='2000FooBa...1Q....X'
expected: This must only contain the first rights content

tests.title: Support for ILIKE (RegTAP 1.1)
tests.query: select ivoid from rr.resource where ivoid ilike '%KeckObs'

tests.title: altIdentifier supported
tests.query: select b.alt_identifier from rr.alt_identifier as a join rr.alt_identifier as b using (ivoid) where a.alt_identifier='nodoi:10.0001/xxx'

tests.title: mirrorURL processed
tests.query: select mirror_url from rr.interface where ivoid ILIKE '%6df%'
